title: The Theory of Everything
text: The story of the relationship between the famous physicist Stephen Hawking and his wife.
The movie explores the relationship between Stephen and Jane, the onset of his illness and his groundbreaking work in physics.
description: A biographical movie about the life of Stephen Hawking.
